API_Description: This function encodes a stream object. Typically, it is used to pass data as part of a SOAP method when it must be encoded in Base 64 or hex encoding.

oStream.description: A stream object to be encoded with the specified encoding type.

cEncoder.description: A string specifying the encoding type. Permissible values are “hex” (for hex-encoded) and “base64” (base 64-encoded).

Returns: A `ReadStream` object that has the appropriate encoding applied.
